displayProperties.name: Arc Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Arc empowered:
- Arc Supers have extended durations.
- Air and ground speed increases.
- Slide distance increases.
- Weapon handling and reload speed increases.
- Melee damage increases.
- Sword damage and lunge range increases.
- Sword ammo is granted every second while equipped.

On PRISM Day, Arc empowerment is applied while using an Arc subclass.

displayProperties.name: Elemental Capacitor
displayProperties.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of the Warmind
displayProperties.description:
The detonations from Warmind Cells you destroy cause disruption, stunning combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption]  Overload Champions  and [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Hammer of the Warmind
displayProperties.description:
The detonations from Warmind Cells you destroy cause disruption, stunning combatants, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption]  Overload Champions  and [Stagger]  Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Stasis Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Stasis empowered:
- Stasis Supers have extended durations.
- Defeated combatants spawn Stasis mines.

On PRISM Day, Stasis empowerment is applied while using a Stasis subclass.

displayProperties.name: Void Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Void empowered:
- Void Supers have extended durations.
- Void grenades and melee attacks deal increased damage.
- Crouching grants invisibility, Truesight, increased energy regeneration, and increased mobility.

On PRISM Day, Void empowerment is applied while using a Void subclass.

displayProperties.name: Solar Empowerment
displayProperties.description:
While Solar empowered:
- Solar Supers have extended durations.
- You radiate damaging Solar energy.
- Damage resistance increases.
- You heal passively.

On PRISM Day, Solar empowerment is applied while using a Solar subclass.

displayProperties.name: Unflinching Auto Rifle Aim
displayProperties.description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Auto Rifles.

displayProperties.name: Overload Hand Cannon
displayProperties.description:
Landing consecutive hits with any Hand Cannon you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output.

Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

displayProperties.name: Thermal Blooming
displayProperties.description: Rapidly defeating combatants with [Solar] Solar or [Stasis] Stasis melee attacks creates an Orb of Power for your fireteam members.
